name: Sound Waves (logeeker)
description:
This is a game that is created during the Global Game Jam 2017 within 48 hours.

The game is about solving musical puzzles and recreating beautiful melodies.

Credits:

The game is writen by 丧尸Logeeker (logeeker@gmail.com)

The game and the levels are designed by 天音（razziegals@gmail.com）

Fair (541077827@qq.com) provides helpful techinical supports.

李峰 (lf1915224438@qq.com) is the graphical artist.
